name: Cycle Dash
description:
How fast can you cycle? Cycle Dash is a competitive, classic button masher to see how fast you can ride 250 metres.

Post your fastest times in the comments section.

How to play

Hold up to start and then cycle through the arrow keys as fast as you can.

Other Info

Made for the Week 155 of the Weekly Game Jam on the theme Cycle.

You will need a keyboard to play.

All code, sprites and music were produced by me over the course of a week.
